strictly.translation[0].definitions[0].d: in a way that must be obeyed
strictly.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Alcohol is strictly forbidden on school premises.
The ban on hunting is not strictly enforced.
strictly.translation[0].definitions[2].d: only for a particular person, thing, or purpose and no one else
strictly.translation[0].definitions[2].e: This is strictly between us. Nobody else must know.
